title: former_carport_steel_frame_after_roof_removal
summary: Remaining steel frame of a former carport after roof dismantling and reuse.
description: Image documents the remaining steel frame structure of a former carport. The roofing materials were dismantled and reused to construct a duck house roof, referenced in data unit 00208. The structure currently remains as a bare frame without roofing.
context_notes: Captures residual structure after material extraction
Part of continuous resource-flow documentation under constrained conditions

external_reference.note: Image shows steel frame after roof removal.
